title: Application of coal-based solid waste artificial soil in the restoration of saline alkali land-taking the saline alkali land restoration of the Emao River in China as an example
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Haidong Zhao, Jiqing Chang, Zifeng Miao, Hongjie Kang, Jianbing Ji, Yu Luan, Zhen Lu, Yong Guo
